title: Stadio Vito Simone Veneziani
text: Stadio Vito Simone Veneziani is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Monopoli">Monopoli</a>, <a href="Italy">Italy</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="S.S.%20Monopoli%201966">Monopoli</a>. The stadium holds 6,880 attendance.
